content: a daisy-shaped corsage looks very chic on your bag hat the chest of your sweater or the collar of your coat what colors are your favorite for different seasons emmy grande herbs is the suggested yarn for each pattern in *kyuuto japanese crafts lacy crochet* although this is only noted in the original japanese edition the pattern calls for 0 6 oz 15 g of lace thread nine 0 2 in 0 5 cm wooden beads a 0 9 in 2 4 cm diameter piece of plastic padding and a 1 in 2 5 cm wide brooch pin pattern has essential written instructions and a symbol chart for the full instructions
